scenario_1.thought: As a historian specializing in the Columbian Exchange, I am acutely aware of the vast inequalities and imbalances that have shaped our world. The Exchange itself, while leading to significant progress in some areas, also resulted in immense suffering and exploitation in others. My research focuses on the historical causes and consequences of inequality, so in this scenario, I want to make a decision that reduces the inequality between persons A and B, even if it means that I will personally have less. The Right choice will ensure that there is no difference in the amount of money between the two parties.

It is important that A still gets money, rather than nothing. In this way there is no negative impact for A.
